Statistics

Class Statistics

  • java.lang.Object
    • Statistics.Statistics
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Statistics
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Class responsible for keeping statistics for a player. It saves the number of quests completed and monsters killed by the player. Also it will calculate the worth of these two combined, into a common score.
    Author:
    Johan
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Statistics.Score
      Class responsible for keeping score.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Statistics(java.lang.String name)
      Creates a clean statistics with 0 in all statistics.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getMonstersKilled()
      Returns the number of monsters killed.
      int getQuestsCompleted()
      Returns the number of quests completed.
      int getTotalScore()
      Retuns a score combined of both monsters killed and quests completed.
      void incMonstersKilled()
      Increases the number of monsters killed with 1.
      void incQuestsCompleted()
      Increases the number of quests completed with 1.
      java.lang.String[] refreshScore()
      This method will get statistics from a server, then sort the highscores according to highest points, and after that return the top 3.
      void submitScore()
      Send the current statistics to a server.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Statistics

        public Statistics(java.lang.String name)
        Creates a clean statistics with 0 in all statistics. Also contains a name to connect to the statistics.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the player.

    • Method Detail

      • getTotalScore

        public int getTotalScore()
        Retuns a score combined of both monsters killed and quests completed. Monsters count as 1 and quests as 5.
        Returns:
        totalscore The combined score.

      • incMonstersKilled

        public void incMonstersKilled()
        Increases the number of monsters killed with 1.

      • incQuestsCompleted

        public void incQuestsCompleted()
        Increases the number of quests completed with 1.

      • getMonstersKilled

        public int getMonstersKilled()
        Returns the number of monsters killed.
        Returns:
        monsterKilled The number of monsters killed.

      • getQuestsCompleted

        public int getQuestsCompleted()
        Returns the number of quests completed.
        Returns:
        QuestsCompleted The number of quests completed

      • refreshScore

        public java.lang.String[] refreshScore()
        This method will get statistics from a server, then sort the highscores according to highest points, and after that return the top 3.
        Returns:
        Top3 A String[] containing the top 3 highscores. First element is the best score.

      • submitScore

        public void submitScore()
        Send the current statistics to a server. The data send contains the name and score of the player.
